FAQ / Wave 6 / Stratagems /
View On Teletraan1.net

V2 Sonicsurge Drone Armor

  1. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    V2 Sonicsurge Drone Armor     [Source: World|Strike FAQ]
    If your opponent attacks one of your characters when all of your characters are untapped and you tap your Raider Ravage, Espionage · Saboteur to boost their defense, Raider Ravage does not become the sole valid target for the opponent’s attack due to its tapping, as it is being tapped after the opponent has chosen a defender. See the Official Expanded Rules for further questions on the relevant attack timing.
